summary: Honestly, do you think that Bucky/Wanda will ever happen? I really wish it did tbh
question: Honestly, do you think that Bucky/Wanda will ever happen? I really wish it did tbh
answer:
Hi!

I believe that it could still be a possibility in the future, regardless of what their situation might be now. A relationship between the two of them would be really interesting to explore, and I can definitely see the appeal of shipping them due to the similarities in their backgrounds. Even if it turns out that a romantic relationship does not happen in the mcu, I really hope that we get to see more interaction between these two characters in the following movies!

Regardless if it happens or not, please do not let that stop you from shipping it!

summary: From the little spark (may burst a mighty flame) - cl410 - Thor (Movies) [Archive of Our Own]
title: From the little spark (may burst a mighty flame) - cl410 - Thor (Movies) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 13/13
Fandom: Thor (Movies), Marvel Cinematic Universe, Teen Wolf (TV)
Rating: Mature
Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
Relationships: Darcy Lewis & The Hales, Darcy Lewis & The Hale Family, Talia Hale/Original Male Character(s), Derek Hale/Stiles Stilinski, Chris Argent/Peter Hale, Other Relationship Tags to Be Added, OFC/OFC, Allison Argent & Lydia Martin, Allison Argent/Scott McCall, Vernon Boyd/Erica Reyes
Characters: Darcy Lewis, Talia Hale, Andrew Hale, Derek Hale, Laura Hale, Cora Hale, Peter Hale, Chris Argent, Allison Argent, Victoria Argent, Kate Argent, Gerard Argent, Alan Deaton, Erica Reyes, Vernon Boyd, Isaac Lahey, Stiles Stilinski, Scott McCall (Teen Wolf), Lydia Martin, Jackson Whittemore, Danny Mahealani, Original Female Character(s), Original Female Character(s) of Color, Original Male Character(s), Original Male Character(s) of Color, Satomi Ito, Original Trans Character(s), Maya Ito, Sophia Reyes, Marin Morrell
Additional Tags: Darcy Lewis-centric, BAMF Darcy Lewis, Alive Hale Family, The Hale Pack - Freeform, Hale Family Feels, Spark!Darcy, Magic Darcy Lewis, Fae & Fairies, will tag as I go, Leave your canon at the door, magic tattoos, Powers!Darcy, Canon-Typical Violence, Darcy’s relationship will come later in the series, Stiles Stilinski & Darcy Lewis, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Alternate Universe - Fusion, Deaf Character, Disabled Character, Seelie Court, The Alpha Pack, BAMF Stiles, Slow Build Derek Hale/Stiles Stilinski, Tattooed Stiles Stilinski, Tattooed Darcy Lewis
Series: Part 1 of Legacy
Summary:

Darcy’s mother taught her only a few important things in the short time they’d had together. Don’t stay in one place for too long. Uphold the Code in everything you do, and never trust those that stray. Step too near the Under-Hill and you’ll be lost forever, your soul enslaved by the Fae lurking in the shadows. And finally, tell no one about the power surging through her veins, passed down from generations of Lewis women.

But most of all, Darcy’s mother taught her to be afraid.

blog.name: brooklyn-b
blog.title: Brooklyn Baby
blog.description: Welcome to my blog, Winter Children❤

summary: A Little One ~ 𝐻𝑒 𝒸𝑜𝓊𝓁𝒹'𝓋𝑒 𝒻𝒶𝓁𝓁𝑒𝓃 𝒾𝓃 𝓁𝑜𝓋𝑒 𝓌𝒾𝓉𝒽 𝒽𝑒𝓇 𝓌𝒾𝓉𝒽 𝒽𝒾𝓈 𝒸𝓁𝑜𝓈𝑒𝒹 ~ Requested By: anonymous Original Request: Hmmmmmm ever done...
caption:
A Little One

~ 𝐻𝑒 𝒸𝑜𝓊𝓁𝒹'𝓋𝑒 𝒻𝒶𝓁𝓁𝑒𝓃 𝒾𝓃 𝓁𝑜𝓋𝑒 𝓌𝒾𝓉𝒽 𝒽𝑒𝓇 𝓌𝒾𝓉𝒽 𝒽𝒾𝓈 𝒸𝓁𝑜𝓈𝑒𝒹 ~

Requested By: anonymous

Original Request: Hmmmmmm ever done a ask with female reader telling Bucky she’s preggy?

Pairing: Bucky Barnes x Reader

Word Count: 468

Warnings: None

A/N: This was the most beautiful imagine I had ever had the pleasure in writing. Thank you for requesting it, anon! I hope you like it!

Amongst the many uniformed soldiers, officers, generals and captains, I easily spotted Bucky out of the busy crowds. His tall stature, I could recognize almost anywhere. It seemed that ever since we had bid our wistful goodbyes and he had gone to fight in the Great War, he had not changed. 

His features that I always described as chiseled as a perfectly carved Michelangelo statue that I couldn’t await to touch. His soft, plump lips that I couldn’t wait to kiss for hours if I could. His soft luscious hair that I wanted desperately to tangle my fingers in. 

The bright rays of sun highlighted the adorable dimples in his cheeks as he smiled once he noticed me in the crowd. He waved at me and quickly made his way to where I stood. Instantly, as he did so, I feel tears trickle down my cheeks as I reach to wipe them away.

“Bucky!” 

I jump into his arms for a tight embrace whilst he wraps his strong arms around my waist and buries his face into my hair and spins us around as we laugh wholeheartedly.

“Oh, doll, I’ve missed you so much!” He exclaims, as he takes a minute to look at me. I place both my hands upon his cheeks and pull him into me for a passionate kiss.

“You haven’t changed at all, angel.” He says after we break the kiss. “Still the most gorgeous dame I love more and more each day.”

I rest my head upon his chest and whisper, though I still knew he could hear me from all the shouts, laughter and chatters around us. “There’s a slight change while you’ve been gone, love.”

Gently, he raises my chin and his blue orbs melt into mine. “What change, doll?”

I peer up at him through my wet lashes, unaware that I had begun crying. I reach for his hand and place it on my belly. “I’m pregnant, Bucky.”

Bucky seemed to stagger back a few steps while his mouth rested agape in astonishment. I noticed the corners of his eyes watering with tears as his fingertips rubbed my belly. “I-I’m going to be a father?”

“Yes, love. You’re going to be a father.”

After a few moments, that he had finally processed my words, surprisingly, he picks me up and spins me around as I hold onto his shoulders. “I’m going to be a father.” He says, kissing me as I laugh at his excitement and joy.

Bucky looks around and throws a fist into the air. “I’m going to be a father!” 

The people around us applaud, cheer and whistle as I blush at the sudden attention. Bucky places me down and wraps his arm around me. “I love you so much, doll.”

“I love you, my hero.”

reblog.comment:
A Little One

blog.name: angelofbenignmalevolence
blog.title: The Pledge, the Turn, the Prestige
blog.description:
"The magician takes the ordinary something and makes it do something extraordinary. Now you're looking for the secret... but you won't find it, because of course you're not really looking." - Cutter, The Prestige

She/Her, Marvel, Resident Evil, How to Get Away with Murder, Tom Hiddleston, whatever else catches my fancy at any given moment.

Check out my "Taste of Tags" page for things that I tag very often!

summary: List 5 things that make you happy, then put this in the askbox of the last 10 people who reblogged something from you. spread...
question: List 5 things that make you happy, then put this in the askbox of the last 10 people who reblogged something from you. spread the positivity! ❤️
answer:
An ask! My very first!! Very excited <3 Hmmm…let’s see….in no particular order…

1) J.R. Ward. Her books give me life and make me want to be a better writer :)

2) Writing. Whether it be the novel I’m getting ready to attempt for NaNo or a fanfic that has been bouncing around my head or a response to my writing partners…I love making characters come alive on the page/screen.

3) Music. I am constantly listening to music, all kinds. I make playlists for my characters/couples when I write to get me in the right frame of mind for writing them. I practice my calligraphy using song lyrics. Music touches my soul.

4) Scotland. OMG I have been living here for the past year and I can’t tell you how beautiful the country and the people are. I’m so blessed to have had the opportunity to move out here, even if it is only temporary. 

5) Marvel. The Comics, the MCU, doesn’t matter. I have fallen in love with so many of the Marvel characters and I am always discovering new characters that I fall in love with and adore :)

title: Mischievous Eyes
body:
Loki was different. Had always been different. He had never let his strangeness bother him, never let what Thor’s friends said about him when they thought he wasn’t listening get to him. It was no bother of his if he had friends or not. He had his mother and when Thor had the time, he had his brother as well. And if Thor didn’t, well, he had magic. Which occasionally lead to mischief.

So really, the situation that he was in right now was completely Thor’s fault. If Thor had just listened to mother and come with him to get herbs from Healer Eir, then he would be completely fine and wouldn’t currently be being chased by her apprentices. It wasn’t his fault his magic acted up, he was still a novice. As father would never let him forget. He ducked around a corner and slid behind one of the many pillars that lined the hallways. Catching his breath, Loki couldn’t help but reflect on how he had gotten into this situation. Thor’s fault indeed.

___

His magic sparked in a serpent green burst of light as someone knocked gently on his chamber door, causing the levitating book to stop flipping its pages and fall violently out of the air. Loki, who had been laying on his belly, idly moving his hand through the air to flip the pages of the now crumpled book, glanced up at the door.

He sighed, a heavy sigh that no child should make, before calling out, “you may come in!” There was no answer at first, causing Loki to sit up on his elbows like a raven about to take flight. Then the door finally opened to reveal who was on the other side.

“Mother,” he breathed in relief, half fearing that it had been Odin or worse, Thor come to demand his attention.

She stood in the doorway, a proud figure with curling hair that was brighter than the rainbow bridge and far more golden than even Heimdall’s armor. The All-mother carried the scent of parchment, ink, and the ever heavy presence of apples as she glided into the room. Loki was transfixed by the sight of his mother, not only because Frigga was not a woman to be trifled with, but also because she was a gentle and comforting presence. It was like laying in the sun, a warm blanket that never felt stifling. ‘One day,’ Loki thought, ‘I will be just like her.’

“Loki dear, I need your help with something.” Frigga called softly, her words, though softly spoken, hit Loki as if the All-mother had yelled them. He scrambled from his perch, his legs getting caught in the sheets. Loki’s face was aflame by the time he tripped his way over to the All-mother.

Trying to maintain what dignity he had left, Loki tilted his chin up an inch in silent challenge at the poorly hidden mirth in Frigga’s eyes. “How can I help you mother?”

It was no bother of his if he had friends or not. He had his mother and when Thor had the time, he had his brother as well. And if Thor didn’t, well, he had magic. blog.name: super-hero-confessions
blog.title: Super-Hero-Confessions
blog.description:
Super-hero-confessions is a blog where you can submit your confessions/personal opinions about any of the super hero movies, comics, television shows, cartoons, etc.

The confessions that are posted are those that are submitted; not the opinions of the blog owners. All the confessions will be anonymous when posted. Feel free to submit photos along with your confession if you would like as well.

If you want us to see a post tag it with either #superheroconfessions or #superhero confessions

summary: The Avengers start to pick up on Vines and things of that nature after Peter hangs out with them
body:
The Avengers start to pick up on Vines and things of that nature after Peter hangs out with them

The Avengers: (all watching Chicken Little because of Peter)

Clint, walking in from making popcorn: Why does everyone keep saying I look like Chicken Little, he’s weak and a coward and I am NOT a coward!

Tony, squeezing his can of soda: PARKER I SWEAR TO GOD

Peter, recording: (through laughs) Oh shit-!

summary: deke: hey gang are we ready to rock! may: no. jemma: not particularly fitz: *glares and rolls his eyes* mack: what’re you...
body:

may: no.

blog.name: snapmyneckandcallmeloki
blog.title: Marvel Blog // Tony Stark Is The Strongest Avenger
blog.description: || Kiera || Irondad & Spiderson || Anti st*rker || main; @snapmyneckandcallmekiera || join my server lads; https://discord.gg/VvCMYdk

summary:
Tony: You expect me to still feel something for you after everything you’ve done?
Steve: I was hoping we could move past this...
body:
Tony: You expect me to still feel something for you after everything you’ve done?

Steve: I was hoping we could move past this and try again. Love is blind, Tony. It lets us see past our mistakes.

Tony, taking off his glasses and squinting: Huh. You’re right, this makes you look a lot more appealing.

Steve: That’s not what i meant-
